data.name: lblShortTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a short title for division.

data.name: lblParentDivision.Help
data.value: Select a parent division for this division.

data.name: lblHomePage.Help
data.value: Specify a home page for the division.

data.name: lblUseCurrentPageAsHomePage.Text
data.value: Use Current Page as Home Page?

data.name: lblUseCurrentPageAsHomePage.Help
data.value: Check to use current page as a home page for the division.

data.name: labelDocumentUrl.Help
data.value: Specify main / regulations document for this division.

data.name: lblWebSite.Help
data.value: A separate website for this division, if available

data.name: labelWebSiteLabel.Help
data.value: Optional label for division website. If not specified, website URL will be used instead.

data.name: lblSecondaryEmail.Help
data.value: Enter the division's secondary email address.

data.name: labelAddress.Help
data.value: Enter post address of the division.

data.name: lblLocation.Help
data.value: Enter location of the division, e.g. office and cabinet number.

data.name: labelWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Select working hours (schedule) for the division from a list.

data.name: labelCustomWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Enter description for custom working hours (schedule) for the division.

data.name: labelStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current division will be published on the site.

data.name: labelEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current division will be removed from publication on the site.

data.name: labelIsSingleEntity.Help
data.value: Check if this division consists of a single employee, and actually represents this employee (usually, the top manager) himself.

data.name: labelIsInformal.Help
data.value: Check if this division is not formal one. Informal divisions can be filtered out from the DivisionDirectory module view.

data.name: labelIsGoverning.Help
data.value: Check if this division is governing one for the organization.

data.name: labelHeadPosition.Help
data.value: Select the position which define the division's head employee. The specific employee will be determined automatically. If system cannot determine head employee, the corresponding position will be considered vacant; if no head position is set, then the division will be considered as one which cannot have head employee at all.
